ygData.subject: Re: mend bones and lesser sheilding
ygData.msgSnippet: Easy, go into Nektulos and buy bulk.  I usually make a weekly stop in Nektulos and auction Buying Bonechips in bulk!  5gp for 20, 1.2 plat for 40, 3plat for
ygData.messageBody:
Easy, go into Nektulos and buy bulk. I usually make a weekly stop
in Nektulos and auction "Buying Bonechips in bulk! 5gp for 20, 1.2 plat for
40, 3plat for 80" or something like that. I don't mind the prices because
at that level we should all be carrying around enough "petty cash", at least
I am. I usually keep a good 12-20 plat on me for bonechips, SOWs (I pay for
them, I think its only fair), and other niceties. Usually it takes no
time at all to rake in about 120-160 bonechips (you carry four backpacks
right?) then head off for another week of fun.

Malark, 20th on Karana

>
> > remember bones and
> > mana are free your life isn't
>
> Where do you find bones... Seeing as the 6th rank (level 20)
> pet takes 4
> bones... I am running a bit low to keep summoning...
>
> Though I do see you are in an undead dungeon... so you get to
> recoup some...
> I killed 40 decaying skells in our homeland (Nektulos forest)
> and got 3 bones
> last night...
>
> Sonoroud Tomebinder
